response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. This opportunity is limited and designed to ensure you receive the best value possible. Kindly let me know if you wish to accept this offer within the next 24 hours.
